attributes.action: Issue a national pardon and apology to witches that were burnt at the stake
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prime minister should recognise the injustice carried out by our country against native witches.  A national apology should be issued to all of the witches which were either burnt, drowned or otherwise harmed by the inhabitants of this country.  Also they should, in the cases where there is insufficient evidence to prove otherwise, be issued a full state-pardon for their supposed crimes.

This should be extended to warlocks too, who were also unjustly hounded.
